Learn Home,  » Courses,  » Part 3: Advanced Site Design with Full Site Editing: Site Editor, Templates and Template Parts 






Part 3: Advanced Site Design with Full Site Editing: Site Editor, Templates and Template Parts




Welcome to the last course in the FSE series.  Are you familiar with using the Site Editor, templates and template parts to enhance the design of your site? If you can’t confidently answer ‘yes’ to this question, this course is for you. 


At the end of this course you will be able to:

Differentiate between the Site Editor and Template Editor.
Explain the function of templates and template parts.
Feel confident using the Site Editor and Template Editor. 
Create a personalized site design using templates and template parts.

You are encouraged to use a test/sandbox site to apply your newly acquired knowledge and skills during this course.


In order to enhance your learning experience, click here to open a private and secure WordPress site that only you can access.





Take Course
